entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 12:55 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:55 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
